item.title: By: Niamh
item.dc:creator: Niamh
item.description: Hi Martha, I just came across your new blog via tweets by @cloudsteph and @krishnade. Best of luck with your future projects and enjoy your vacation. Exciting times! :) All the best, Niamh.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Liam Noonan
item.dc:creator: Liam Noonan
item.description: best of luck Martha. I am sure no matter what you turn your hand to it will be interesting and innovative. Liam Noonan
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Rory
item.dc:creator: Rory
item.content:encoded:
Upon further consideration: a) this blog has only existed
for a couple of months b) I have know you for less than a year c)
I’m an idiot.

item.title: By: Rory
item.dc:creator: Rory
item.description: Hey Martha, That was a fun read. If I knew this blog was here I would have subscribed years ago!
item.content:encoded:
Hey Martha, That was a fun read. If I knew this blog was
here I would have subscribed years ago!
